languages.text: "Он еще может искупить свои преступления. Отдай его мне — пусть очищает душу, драя палубы моего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Он еще может искупить свои преступления. Отдай его мне — пусть очищает душу, драя палубы моего корабля".

languages.text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
languages.original_text: "Он еще может искупить свои преступления. Отдай его мне — пусть очищает душу, драя палубы моего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
"He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
"He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
"He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
"He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."
"He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

languages.text: “他依然可以赎罪。把他交给我，让他在我的船上打扫甲板，以此来净化他的灵魂吧。”
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: “他依然可以赎罪。把他交给我，让他在我的船上打扫甲板，以此来净化他的灵魂吧。”

languages.text: 「あいつはまだ罪を償うことができる。{mf|俺|私}に預けるんだ。{mf|俺|私}の船のデッキを掃除させることで、魂を清めさせよう」
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「あいつはまだ罪を償うことができる。{mf|俺|私}に預けるんだ。{mf|俺|私}の船のデッキを掃除させることで、魂を清めさせよう」

languages.text: «Todavía puede expiar sus crímenes. Entréguemelo. Que purifique su alma barriendo las cubiertas de mi nave».
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Todavía puede expiar sus crímenes. Entréguemelo. Que purifique su alma barriendo las cubiertas de mi nave».

languages.text: "Er kann noch immer für seine Verbrechen büßen. Gebt ihn mir. Lasst ihn seine Seele läutern, indem er die Decks meines Schiffs schrubbt."
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Er kann noch immer für seine Verbrechen büßen. Gebt ihn mir. Lasst ihn seine Seele läutern, indem er die Decks meines Schiffs schrubbt."

languages.text: « Il peut encore expier ses crimes. Confiez-le-moi, il purifiera son âme en récurant les ponts de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: « Il peut encore expier ses crimes. Confiez-le-moi, il purifiera son âme en récurant les ponts de mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Suçlarının bedelini hâlâ ödeyebilir. Onu bana ver. Ruhunu, gemimin güvertelerini süpürerek arındırsın."
languages.original_text: "He can still atone for his crimes. Give him to me. Let him purify his soul by sweeping the decks of my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlarının bedelini hâlâ ödeyebilir. Onu bana ver. Ruhunu, gemimin güvertelerini süpürerek arındırsın."
